H0.text: In our solar system, the sun is composed of mostly which gas. Helium (He)

H1.text: In our solar system, the sun is composed of mostly which gas. Oxygen (O₂)

H2.text: In our solar system, the sun is composed of mostly which gas. Nitrogen (N₂)

H3.text: In our solar system, the sun is composed of mostly which gas. H₂

A4.text: Hydrogen accounts for 74.9% of the mass of the Sun in the photosphere.

A5.text: The Sun's surface layer, its photosphere, consists mostly of hydrogen (~73%) and helium (~25%).
